cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 14th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 14th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 12 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
The Great Hall 
This is the largest room in The Mansion, more people equals more fun, right? This room sports a fancy air conditioner, so you and your new friends can brag at breakfast about how well you slept on that 40-degree night.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 3 nights stay on your dates

dorms.name: Standard 7 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
The Boudoir 
Ladies, we hear you! We all deserve a boudoir; a lovely room designed just for us. No gentlemen allowed, these rooms ready for sleeping, dressing, relaxing, and perhaps entertaining. 

Great for: Ladies, budget-conscious, relaxers

dorms.name: Basic 7 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Ever seen a grand staircase at the bottom of a few pints? Let me tell you; it's not a pretty sight. Located close to the bar and common areas on the ground floor, your evening stroll to bed is easier than getting your morning latte.

privates.name: Basic Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Cosy and comfortable The Private Chambers are located at the far end of each wing on the top floor. Perfect for couples who like privacy by night and social vibes by day. This room has a double bed, TV, towels included and of course climate control.
